contactFaqs.pageSubtitle: Answers to Common Questions About Our Logistics Services
contactFaqs.heading: Your Questions, Answered
contactFaqs.headingText: Find answers to the most common questions about shipping, customs, insurance, and our logistics services. If you do not find what you are looking for, please {contactLink}.
contactFaqs.faq1Q: How long does international shipping typically take?
contactFaqs.faq1A1: Shipping times vary based on the mode of transport, origin, and destination. Here are general estimates for shipments from or to Dakar, Senegal:
contactFaqs.faq1OceanText: 15-25 days to European ports (e.g., Le Havre, Rotterdam, Barcelona), 30-45 days to Asian ports (e.g., Shanghai, Singapore), and 20-30 days to North American ports (e.g., New York, Houston). These times can vary based on transshipment connections and port congestion.
contactFaqs.faq1AirText: 2-5 business days to most global destinations, including customs clearance at both ends. Express air services can deliver within 1-3 days for urgent shipments.
contactFaqs.faq1RoadText: 2-7 days for regional West African destinations depending on distance, border crossings, and road conditions.
contactFaqs.faq1Closing: WTL provides estimated transit times for every quote so you can plan your supply chain accordingly.
contactFaqs.faq2Q: How can I track my shipment?
contactFaqs.faq2A1: WTL provides multiple ways to track your shipments:
contactFaqs.faq2PortalText: Log in to your WTL customer portal at any time to view real-time shipment status, including current location, estimated arrival time, and milestone events (picked up, departed origin, in transit, arrived at port, cleared customs, delivered).
contactFaqs.faq2EmailText: We send proactive email notifications at key milestones throughout the shipment journey. You can customize which events trigger notifications.
contactFaqs.faq2ManagerText: Your WTL account manager is always available by phone or email to provide detailed status updates and address any concerns about your shipment.
contactFaqs.faq2Closing: For ocean shipments, we also provide direct links to carrier tracking pages so you can verify vessel positions independently.
contactFaqs.faq3Q: How are customs duties and taxes calculated?
contactFaqs.faq3A1: Customs duties in Senegal are calculated based on several factors:
contactFaqs.faq3HSText: Every product is assigned a Harmonized System (HS) tariff code that determines the applicable duty rate. Senegal follows the WAEMU/UEMOA Common External Tariff with four bands: 0% for essential goods, 5% for raw materials and capital goods, 10% for semi-finished products, and 20% for finished consumer goods.
contactFaqs.faq3ValueText: Duties are typically calculated on the CIF (Cost, Insurance, Freight) value of the goods, meaning the product cost plus insurance and shipping charges to the port of Dakar.
contactFaqs.faq3LeviesText: Beyond the base duty, imports are subject to VAT (18%), a 1% statistical fee, 1% community solidarity levy, 0.5% ECOWAS community levy, and COSEC charges.
contactFaqs.faq3Closing: WTL provides detailed duty and tax estimates before your goods ship, so there are no surprises. Our customs brokers ensure correct classification to avoid overpayment or penalties.
contactFaqs.faq4Q: Do I need cargo insurance, and what does it cover?
contactFaqs.faq4A1: While cargo insurance is not legally mandatory for all shipments, WTL strongly recommends it. Carrier liability is severely limited under international conventions: ocean carriers typically limit liability to approximately USD 500 per container under the Hague-Visby Rules, regardless of the actual cargo value.
contactFaqs.faq4AllRiskText: Protects against physical loss or damage from virtually any external cause including rough handling, water damage, theft, and accidents during transit.
contactFaqs.faq4NamedText: A more economical option covering specific risks such as fire, sinking, collision, and natural disasters.
contactFaqs.faq4WarText: Additional coverage for losses caused by war, civil unrest, strikes, or terrorism, particularly important for certain trade routes.
contactFaqs.faq4Closing: Insurance premiums typically range from 0.3% to 1.5% of the cargo value depending on the commodity, route, and coverage level. WTL arranges insurance through reputable underwriters and assists with claims processing if needed.
contactFaqs.faq5Q: What are the packaging requirements for international shipping?
contactFaqs.faq5A1: Proper packaging is essential for protecting your goods during international transit. General requirements include:
contactFaqs.faq5OceanText: Goods must be packaged to withstand stacking pressure, vibration, humidity, and potential rough seas. Use export-grade packaging, palletize when possible, and ensure containers are properly stuffed to prevent shifting. Wooden packaging must comply with ISPM-15 (heat treated and marked) to meet phytosanitary requirements.
contactFaqs.faq5AirText: Packaging must meet IATA standards. Goods should be securely packed to handle pressure changes and multiple handling points. Weight distribution must be even, and packages must fit standard ULD (Unit Load Device) dimensions.
contactFaqs.faq5HazText: DG (Dangerous Goods) must be packaged in UN-certified containers with proper labeling, markings, and documentation per IMDG Code (sea) or IATA DGR (air).
contactFaqs.faq5Closing: WTL offers professional packaging and crating services for sensitive, fragile, or high-value cargo. Contact us for specific packaging guidance for your products.
contactFaqs.faq6Q: What items are prohibited or restricted for import into Senegal?
contactFaqs.faq6A1: Senegal prohibits or restricts the import of several categories of goods:
contactFaqs.faq6ProhibitedText: Narcotics and psychotropic substances, counterfeit goods, pornographic materials, certain weapons and ammunition, and products that violate intellectual property rights.
contactFaqs.faq6RestrictedText: Pharmaceuticals (Ministry of Health authorization), food products (sanitary/phytosanitary certificates), chemicals and pesticides (environmental permits), telecommunications equipment (ARTP authorization), used vehicles over a certain age, and certain electronics requiring type approval.
contactFaqs.faq6CitesText: Endangered species products, ivory, and certain animal or plant specimens require CITES permits.
contactFaqs.faq6Closing: WTL reviews every shipment against current regulations and advises clients on any permits or certifications needed before shipping. This proactive approach prevents costly seizures or returns at the border.
contactFaqs.faq7Q: What are Incoterms and which one should I use?
contactFaqs.faq7A1: Incoterms (International Commercial Terms) are standardized trade rules published by the International Chamber of Commerce (ICC) that define the responsibilities of buyers and sellers in international transactions. The most commonly used Incoterms include:
contactFaqs.faq7EXWText: The buyer bears all costs and risks from the seller's premises. Best for experienced importers who want full control.
contactFaqs.faq7FOBText: The seller delivers goods onto the vessel; risk transfers once on board. Very common for ocean freight from Asia.
contactFaqs.faq7CIFText: The seller pays freight and insurance to the destination port. The buyer handles import clearance. Most common for imports into Senegal.
contactFaqs.faq7DDPText: The seller handles everything including customs and duties at destination. Simplest for the buyer but most expensive.
contactFaqs.faq7Closing: WTL can advise on the best Incoterm for your specific transaction based on your experience level, relationship with the supplier, and cost optimization goals.
contactFaqs.faq8Q: What payment methods does WTL accept?
contactFaqs.faq8A1: WTL offers flexible payment options for our logistics services:
contactFaqs.faq8BankText: Direct wire transfer to our bank accounts in Senegal (CFA Franc) or international accounts (USD, EUR). This is the most common payment method for commercial clients.
contactFaqs.faq8CorporateText: Established clients can apply for a credit account with net-15 or net-30 payment terms, subject to credit approval.
contactFaqs.faq8LCText: For large transactions, we accept payment through documentary letters of credit issued by recognized banks.
contactFaqs.faq8MobileText: For smaller domestic transactions, we accept Orange Money and Wave payments.
contactFaqs.faq8Closing: All invoices are itemized and transparent, showing each cost component separately (freight, customs duties, handling charges, etc.). We provide pro-forma invoices before service delivery so you can arrange payment in advance.
contactFaqs.faq9Q: How do I file a claim for damaged or lost cargo?
contactFaqs.faq9A1: If your cargo arrives damaged or is lost during transit, WTL has a structured claims process:
contactFaqs.faq9Step1Text: Notify WTL and the carrier within 3 days of delivery for visible damage, or within 15 days for concealed damage. Document the damage with photographs and retain all packaging materials.
contactFaqs.faq9Step2Text: Submit a formal written claim with supporting documents: commercial invoice, bill of lading, packing list, damage photographs, survey report (if applicable), and a statement of the claimed amount.
contactFaqs.faq9Step3Text: WTL coordinates a cargo survey if needed and works with the carrier and insurer to investigate the claim. We act as your advocate throughout the process.
contactFaqs.faq9Step4Text: Once liability is established, the claim is settled per the terms of the cargo insurance policy or carrier liability limits. Most claims are resolved within 30-60 days.
contactFaqs.faq9Closing: Having cargo insurance significantly simplifies and expedites the claims process. WTL assists with all claims documentation and negotiations at no additional charge.
contactFaqs.faq10Q: What are WTL's warehousing fees and services?
contactFaqs.faq10A1: WTL offers warehousing and storage services at our facilities in Dakar with the following options:
contactFaqs.faq10ShortText: Ideal for goods awaiting customs clearance or last-mile delivery. Typically billed per cubic meter per day or per pallet position per day. First 3 days of storage are often included in our clearing service package.
contactFaqs.faq10LongText: Monthly rates available for businesses needing ongoing storage. Includes inventory management, stock reporting, and order fulfillment services. Rates vary by volume and cargo type.
contactFaqs.faq10SpecialText: Temperature-controlled storage for perishables, secured areas for high-value goods, and covered/open yard storage for oversized cargo and vehicles. Pricing is customized based on requirements.
contactFaqs.faq10ValueText: Labeling, repackaging, kitting, quality inspection, and container stuffing/destuffing are available at additional charges.
contactFaqs.faq10Closing: Warehousing fees depend on cargo volume, storage duration, handling requirements, and any special conditions. Contact us for a customized warehousing quote tailored to your needs.
contactFaqs.ctaText: Our logistics experts are ready to help with any question not covered here. Reach out and get a personalized response.

contactPortal.pageSubtitle: Access Your Shipments, Documents, and Analytics in One Place
contactPortal.loginText: Access your WTL customer portal to manage shipments, view documents, track deliveries, and more. If you do not have an account yet, contact your WTL account manager to request portal access.
contactPortal.featuresHeading: Everything You Need in One Dashboard
contactPortal.featuresText: The WTL Customer Portal gives you full visibility and control over your logistics operations, available 24/7 from any device.
contactPortal.trackingText: Monitor all your active shipments in real time on an interactive map. View current location, transit milestones, estimated arrival times, and carrier details for every shipment. Receive instant notifications when status changes occur, so you always know exactly where your cargo is.
contactPortal.documentsText: Access all your shipping documents in a secure, organized digital archive. Bills of lading, commercial invoices, customs declarations, certificates of origin, insurance certificates, and delivery receipts are all available for download. No more chasing paperwork or waiting for courier deliveries.
contactPortal.invoiceText: View, download, and manage all your WTL invoices in one place. Track payment status, access detailed cost breakdowns for each shipment, and download statements for your accounting records. Set up automatic payment reminders so you never miss a due date.
contactPortal.bookingText: Create new shipment bookings directly from the portal. Enter cargo details, select service levels, request quotes, and confirm bookings without a single phone call. Manage recurring shipments with saved templates to speed up the booking process for regular trade lanes.
contactPortal.analyticsText: Gain valuable insights into your shipping patterns with interactive charts and reports. Analyze spending trends by trade lane, carrier, and service type. Track on-time delivery performance, compare rates over time, and identify opportunities to optimize your logistics operations and reduce costs.
contactPortal.supportText: Communicate directly with your WTL operations team through the built-in messaging system. Open support tickets, share files, and maintain a complete communication history for every shipment. Get faster responses and keep all correspondence organized in one place.
contactPortal.ctaText: Contact your WTL account manager or reach out to our support team to set up your customer portal account.

contactInquiry.pageSubtitle: Request a Detailed Quote for Your Shipping Needs
contactInquiry.heading: Shipment Inquiry Form
contactInquiry.headingText: Complete the form below with as much detail as possible to receive an accurate and competitive freight quote. Our team will respond within 24 business hours with a customized logistics solution for your shipment.
contactInquiry.placeholderCargoDescription: Describe the goods (product type, HS code if known, number of packages or containers)
contactInquiry.placeholderComments: Any additional information that would help us prepare your quote (special delivery instructions, timeline constraints, recurring shipment needs, etc.)
contactInquiry.privacyNotice: By submitting this form, you agree to be contacted by WTL regarding your shipment inquiry. Your information is kept confidential and will not be shared with third parties.
contactInquiry.immediateText: For urgent shipments or time-sensitive inquiries, contact us directly by phone. Our operations team is available during business hours to provide immediate support.

contactInquirySuccess.pageSubtitle: Thank You for Contacting World Trans & Logistics
contactInquirySuccess.heading: Your Inquiry Has Been Received!
contactInquirySuccess.thankYouText: Thank you for submitting your shipment inquiry to World Trans & Logistics. Our team is reviewing your request and will prepare a customized quote for you.
contactInquirySuccess.referenceNote: Please save this number for your records and reference it in any follow-up communication.
contactInquirySuccess.step1Text: You will receive an email confirmation at the address you provided, summarizing your inquiry details and reference number. This should arrive within a few minutes. Please check your spam folder if you do not see it.
contactInquirySuccess.step2Text: Our operations team will review your shipment details, research the optimal routing and carrier options, and calculate accurate costs including freight, duties (if applicable), and handling charges for your specific cargo requirements.
contactInquirySuccess.step3Text: Within 24 business hours, you will receive a detailed, itemized quote via email. The quote will include freight costs, transit times, recommended service options, and any applicable surcharges so you can make an informed decision.
contactInquirySuccess.step4Text: A dedicated WTL representative will follow up to answer any questions about the quote, discuss alternative options if needed, and help you confirm the booking once you are ready to proceed. We are here to make the process as smooth as possible.
contactInquirySuccess.actionsHeading: What Would You Like to Do Next?
contactInquirySuccess.actionsText: Explore our services or return to the homepage while we prepare your quote.

contactLocations.pageSubtitle: Our Offices and Regional Presence Across West Africa
contactLocations.headquartersText1: Our headquarters in Dakar is the nerve center of World Trans & Logistics operations. Strategically located in the heart of the city near the Port of Dakar, our main office houses our management team, operations center, customs brokerage department, and customer service division.
contactLocations.headquartersText2: From this location, we coordinate logistics operations across West Africa and manage our global freight forwarding network spanning over 50 countries. The Dakar office serves as the primary contact point for all client inquiries, quotes, and operational management.
contactLocations.hoursValue: Mon-Fri 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM | Sat 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM
contactLocations.regionalText: WTL maintains regional offices and partnerships across West Africa to provide seamless logistics coverage throughout the sub-region. Each office is staffed with experienced logistics professionals who understand local regulations, customs procedures, and market conditions.
contactLocations.abidjanText: Our Abidjan office serves as the gateway to Francophone West Africa's largest economy. We manage imports and exports through the Port of Abidjan, one of the busiest ports in the region, and provide customs brokerage, warehousing, and transit services.
contactLocations.bamakoText: Mali is a key landlocked market served through the Dakar-Bamako corridor. Our Bamako office specializes in transit cargo management, coordinating the overland movement of goods from the Port of Dakar to destinations throughout Mali, including mining sites and industrial zones.
contactLocations.conakryText: Guinea's rich mineral resources drive significant import and export activity. Our Conakry office handles freight forwarding, customs clearance, and project logistics for the mining sector, as well as general cargo for commercial importers and exporters operating in the Guinean market.
contactLocations.banjulText: The Gambia, located within Senegal's borders, is a natural extension of our logistics network. Our Banjul office facilitates cross-border trade between Senegal and The Gambia, manages port operations at the Port of Banjul, and provides clearing and forwarding services for the Gambian market.
contactLocations.nouakchottText: Our Nouakchott office serves Mauritania's growing economy, handling freight forwarding through the Port of Nouakchott (Port de l'Amitie) and the newer Port of Tanit. We specialize in mining logistics, fish exports, and general import clearance for businesses operating in Mauritania.
contactLocations.globalNetworkText: Beyond our own offices, WTL partners with a network of trusted agents and correspondents in over 50 countries worldwide. From major logistics hubs in Europe, Asia, and the Americas to specialized providers in emerging markets, our global network ensures seamless end-to-end service wherever your cargo needs to go.
contactLocations.globalNetworkStats: 50+ Countries | 100+ Partner Agents | Every Major Trade Lane
contactLocations.coverageText: Our strategic office locations and agent network allow WTL to cover all major trade corridors in and out of West Africa.
contactLocations.corridorDakarBamakoText: The primary trade route connecting landlocked Mali to the sea. WTL manages thousands of containers annually on this corridor, handling road transport, transit customs procedures, and final delivery across Mali.
contactLocations.corridorCoastalText: Connecting Nouakchott, Dakar, Banjul, Conakry, and Abidjan by road and coastal shipping. WTL facilitates intra-regional trade along this corridor, managing border crossings and ECOWAS trade documentation.
contactLocations.corridorEuropeText: Major shipping lanes between West African ports and European hubs including Le Havre, Marseille, Rotterdam, Antwerp, Barcelona, and Hamburg. Weekly vessel departures and daily air freight connections.
contactLocations.corridorAsiaText: Growing trade lanes connecting Chinese, Indian, and Southeast Asian manufacturing centers to West African markets. WTL manages the full supply chain including sourcing support, quality inspection, and door-to-door delivery.
contactLocations.ctaTitle: Need Logistics Support in West Africa?
contactLocations.ctaText: Contact the WTL office nearest to you or reach our headquarters in Dakar for any logistics inquiry. We are ready to serve you across the region and beyond.

aboutOverview.pageSubtitle: Discover who we are and what drives us to deliver world-class logistics solutions from the heart of West Africa.
aboutOverview.legacyTitle: A Legacy of Logistics Excellence in West Africa
aboutOverview.legacyP1: World Trans & Logistics (WTL) was founded with a clear purpose: to serve as the vital bridge connecting West African businesses to the global marketplace. Headquartered in Dakar, Senegal, WTL has grown from a regional freight forwarding company into a comprehensive logistics provider with a footprint that spans over 50 countries across six continents.
aboutOverview.legacyP2: Our journey began with a deep understanding of the unique challenges faced by businesses operating in and out of West Africa. From navigating complex customs regulations to managing multi-modal supply chains across diverse terrains, WTL was built to solve the logistics puzzles that others overlook. Over the past 25 years, we have earned the trust of multinational corporations, small and medium enterprises, and government agencies alike.
aboutOverview.legacyP3: Today, WTL stands as a testament to what is possible when local expertise meets global ambition. Our team of seasoned logistics professionals combines on-the-ground knowledge of West African trade corridors with a world-class approach to supply chain management, ensuring every shipment arrives safely, on time, and within budget.
aboutOverview.missionTitle: Empowering Global Trade from Dakar to the World
aboutOverview.missionText: Our mission is to provide seamless, efficient, and cost-effective logistics services that empower businesses to thrive in the global marketplace. We are committed to bridging the gap between West Africa and international markets through innovation, reliability, and a relentless focus on customer satisfaction.
aboutOverview.keyFactsText: Numbers that reflect our commitment to excellence and our growing impact on global trade.
aboutOverview.yearsExpText: For over twenty-five years, WTL has been a trusted logistics partner for businesses across West Africa and beyond. Our experience spans every mode of transport, every type of cargo, and every regulatory environment in the region.
aboutOverview.countriesText: Our extensive network of agents, partners, and offices reaches more than 50 countries worldwide. Whether your cargo is destined for Europe, Asia, the Americas, or anywhere in Africa, WTL has the connections to make it happen.
aboutOverview.hqText: Strategically located at the westernmost point of Africa, our Dakar headquarters gives us unparalleled access to major Atlantic shipping lanes, international airports, and overland routes connecting the entire West African Economic and Monetary Union (WAEMU) zone.
aboutOverview.shipmentsText: Every year, we handle thousands of shipments ranging from small parcels to oversized project cargo. Each shipment receives the same meticulous attention to detail, ensuring safe and timely delivery regardless of size or complexity.
aboutOverview.apartText: At WTL, we combine the reach of a global logistics network with the deep, hands-on expertise that only comes from years of operating in West Africa.
aboutOverview.deepKnowledgeText: Operating in West Africa requires more than logistics know-how -- it demands an intimate understanding of local markets, regulatory frameworks, infrastructure realities, and cultural nuances. Our team possesses this knowledge because we live and work in the region every day. We know the fastest routes, the most reliable carriers, and the customs procedures that can make or break a shipment timeline.
aboutOverview.endToEndText: From the moment your cargo is picked up at its origin to the final delivery at its destination, WTL manages every step of the journey. Our integrated approach covers freight forwarding, customs brokerage, warehousing, distribution, and last-mile delivery. This means you deal with a single, accountable partner rather than juggling multiple service providers.
aboutOverview.techText: We invest in cutting-edge logistics technology to provide our clients with real-time visibility into their supply chains. Our digital platforms enable shipment tracking, automated documentation, performance analytics, and seamless communication between all stakeholders in the logistics chain.
aboutOverview.sustainText: As a company rooted in Africa, we are deeply committed to sustainable practices. WTL actively works to minimize the environmental impact of our operations through route optimization, fuel-efficient transport modes, and partnerships with carriers who share our commitment to a greener future. We believe that responsible logistics is not just good ethics -- it is good business.
aboutOverview.ctaTitle: Ready to partner with a logistics company that truly understands West Africa?
aboutOverview.ctaText: Whether you are shipping goods into Senegal, exporting across the continent, or managing a complex international supply chain, WTL has the expertise and the network to deliver results.

aboutVision.pageSubtitle: Shaping the future of logistics in West Africa and beyond.
aboutVision.visionQuote: "To be the leading logistics partner in West Africa and beyond, connecting businesses to global opportunities through innovative, reliable, and sustainable logistics solutions."
aboutVision.visionP1: This vision is more than a statement -- it is the compass that guides every decision we make at World Trans & Logistics. It reflects our ambition to set the standard for logistics excellence across the African continent while building bridges that connect local enterprises to the vast opportunities of the global economy.
aboutVision.visionP2: We envision a future where African businesses compete on a level playing field with their counterparts around the world, supported by logistics infrastructure and services that are second to none. WTL is committed to making this future a reality by continuously raising the bar for what logistics companies in the region can achieve.
aboutVision.pillarsTitle: The Pillars That Drive Our Future
aboutVision.pillarsText: Our vision is brought to life through four strategic pillars that shape our investments, partnerships, and daily operations.
aboutVision.globalReachText: We are expanding our network to cover every major trade lane in the world. Through strategic partnerships with leading carriers, port authorities, and logistics providers on every continent, WTL is building a truly global platform that originates from the heart of West Africa. Our goal is to ensure that no destination is out of reach for our clients, whether they are shipping consumer goods to Europe, raw materials to Asia, or agricultural products to the Americas.
aboutVision.techInnovText: The future of logistics is digital, and WTL is at the forefront of this transformation. We are investing in advanced tracking systems, artificial intelligence for route optimization, blockchain for supply chain transparency, and digital platforms that give our clients complete visibility and control over their shipments. By harnessing technology, we aim to eliminate inefficiencies, reduce costs, and provide a seamless experience from booking to delivery.
aboutVision.sustainabilityText: As custodians of global trade, we recognize our responsibility to protect the planet for future generations. Our vision includes a commitment to reducing our carbon footprint through green logistics practices, investing in fuel-efficient vehicles and vessels, optimizing routes to minimize emissions, and supporting renewable energy initiatives in our warehousing and office operations. We believe that sustainable logistics is not only an environmental imperative but also a competitive advantage.
aboutVision.communityText: Our vision extends beyond business. WTL is dedicated to contributing to the economic development of Senegal and West Africa by creating jobs, training the next generation of logistics professionals, and fostering partnerships with local businesses. We believe that when communities thrive, businesses thrive -- and we are committed to being an active force for positive change in every market we serve.
aboutVision.lookingAheadP1: The global logistics landscape is evolving rapidly, driven by technological advancements, shifting trade patterns, and growing demands for speed and transparency. WTL is not simply adapting to these changes -- we are actively shaping the future of logistics in our region.
aboutVision.lookingAheadP2: Our strategic roadmap includes expanding our warehousing capacity in key West African hubs, launching new digital services for small and medium enterprises, deepening our presence in emerging markets, and strengthening our air and ocean freight capabilities to handle the growing volume of intra-African trade.
aboutVision.lookingAheadP3: The African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) presents enormous opportunities for businesses across the continent, and WTL is positioning itself to be the logistics partner of choice for companies looking to capitalize on this historic agreement. By investing in infrastructure, technology, and talent today, we are building the foundation for a future where seamless trade across Africa is not just a possibility but a reality.
aboutVision.lookingAheadP4: We invite you to join us on this journey. Whether you are a multinational corporation or a growing local business, WTL is ready to be your trusted logistics partner as we build the future of global trade together.
aboutVision.ctaTitle: Share our vision? Let us build the future of logistics together.
aboutVision.ctaText: Connect with WTL today and discover how our forward-thinking approach to logistics can help your business reach new markets and achieve new heights.

aboutMission.pageSubtitle: Driving seamless logistics solutions that empower businesses worldwide.
aboutMission.missionQuote: "To provide seamless, efficient, and cost-effective logistics services that empower businesses to thrive in the global marketplace."
aboutMission.missionP1: At World Trans & Logistics, our mission is the foundation of everything we do. It defines how we serve our clients, how we develop our people, and how we contribute to the economies and communities where we operate. Every shipment we handle, every route we plan, and every partnership we build is guided by our unwavering commitment to making global trade accessible, affordable, and reliable for businesses of all sizes.
aboutMission.missionP2: We understand that behind every shipment is a business counting on us -- a manufacturer waiting for raw materials, a retailer expecting inventory, or an exporter fulfilling an international order. That responsibility drives us to deliver nothing less than excellence, every single day.
aboutMission.pillarsTitle: The Four Pillars of Our Mission
aboutMission.pillarsText: Our mission is built on four foundational pillars that guide our strategy, our operations, and our culture.
aboutMission.reliabilityP1: Reliability is the cornerstone of our service promise. In logistics, every delay has a ripple effect -- missed production schedules, empty shelves, and lost revenue. WTL is built on a culture of dependability where commitments are honoured, timelines are met, and clients can plan their operations with confidence knowing that their logistics partner will deliver, every time.
aboutMission.reliabilityP2: We achieve reliability through meticulous planning, redundant systems, proactive communication, and a network of vetted partners who share our standards. When disruptions occur, our experienced teams respond swiftly with contingency plans to keep your supply chain moving.
aboutMission.innovationP1: The logistics industry is undergoing a profound transformation, and WTL is committed to leading the charge. We continuously invest in new technologies, processes, and approaches that make logistics faster, smarter, and more transparent. From AI-powered route optimization to real-time shipment tracking and digital documentation, we leverage innovation to deliver superior outcomes for our clients.
aboutMission.innovationP2: Innovation at WTL is not limited to technology. We also innovate in how we structure our services, how we price our solutions, and how we engage with our clients -- always looking for better ways to add value and simplify the logistics experience.
aboutMission.customerP1: Our clients are at the heart of everything we do. We believe that great logistics is not one-size-fits-all -- it requires listening to each client's unique needs, understanding their business objectives, and designing tailored solutions that deliver measurable results. At WTL, every client has a dedicated point of contact, and our teams are trained to anticipate challenges before they arise.
aboutMission.customerP2: We measure our success not by the volume of cargo we move, but by the satisfaction and growth of the businesses we serve. Our 98% client satisfaction rate is a reflection of this philosophy in action.
aboutMission.sustainabilityP1: We believe that responsible logistics is the only path forward. WTL integrates sustainability into our operations by optimizing transportation routes to reduce fuel consumption, partnering with eco-conscious carriers, investing in energy-efficient warehousing, and minimizing waste throughout our supply chain processes.
aboutMission.sustainabilityP2: Our sustainability mission extends to the communities we serve. We actively support local economic development through job creation, skills training, and partnerships with local suppliers and service providers. By building a sustainable business, we help build a sustainable future for West Africa and beyond.
aboutMission.deliverText: Our mission comes to life through the dedication of our team, the strength of our network, and the trust of our clients.
aboutMission.dedicatedTeamsText: Every department at WTL -- from operations and customs brokerage to finance and customer support -- is aligned around our mission. We invest in continuous training and professional development to ensure our people have the skills and knowledge to deliver world-class service in an ever-changing global trade environment.
aboutMission.robustNetworkText: Our mission is powered by a vast network of agents, carriers, port operators, and technology partners spanning more than 50 countries. This network allows us to offer flexible, multi-modal solutions that adapt to the unique requirements of each shipment, whether it is a time-sensitive air freight delivery or a cost-optimized ocean freight movement.
aboutMission.ctaTitle: Experience logistics driven by mission, not just metrics
aboutMission.ctaText: Partner with WTL and discover the difference that a mission-focused logistics company can make for your business. From Dakar to the world, we are here to help you succeed.

aboutTeam.pageSubtitle: Meet the dedicated professionals behind World Trans & Logistics.
aboutTeam.introTitle: A Team Built on Expertise and Dedication
aboutTeam.introText: At World Trans & Logistics, our greatest asset is our people. Our diverse team of logistics professionals brings together decades of combined experience in freight forwarding, supply chain management, customs brokerage, warehousing, and international trade. United by a shared commitment to excellence, our departments work seamlessly together to deliver the reliable, innovative logistics solutions that our clients depend on.
aboutTeam.deptText: Each department at WTL plays a critical role in ensuring that every shipment is handled with precision, care, and professionalism from start to finish.
aboutTeam.ceoText: The CEO of World Trans & Logistics provides the strategic leadership and vision that drives the company forward. With a deep understanding of the global logistics landscape and a passion for West African economic development, our CEO sets the direction for growth, innovation, and excellence across all areas of the business. Under this leadership, WTL has expanded from a regional freight forwarder into a comprehensive, multi-modal logistics provider serving clients in over 50 countries.
aboutTeam.dgText: The Director General oversees the day-to-day strategic operations of WTL, translating the company's vision into actionable plans and measurable outcomes. This role ensures that all departments are aligned with company objectives, that service quality standards are consistently met, and that the business adapts proactively to changes in the market. The Director General works closely with every team to ensure that WTL's operations run smoothly, efficiently, and in full compliance with international regulations.
aboutTeam.financeText: The Finance Department is the financial engine of WTL, responsible for budgeting, accounting, financial reporting, and strategic investment planning. Our finance team ensures that the company operates on a sound financial footing, enabling us to invest in new capabilities, expand our network, and offer competitive pricing to our clients. They also manage invoicing, payment processing, and financial compliance, providing transparent and accurate financial management that our clients and partners can trust.
aboutTeam.adminText: The Administration Department serves as the operational backbone of WTL, ensuring that all internal processes run smoothly and efficiently. From human resources management and office operations to procurement and regulatory compliance, the administration team creates the stable foundation upon which all other departments build. They manage employee development programs, maintain corporate governance standards, and handle the critical documentation and legal processes that keep the company running seamlessly.
aboutTeam.warehouseText: The Warehouse Department manages WTL's storage and distribution facilities, ensuring that all goods are received, stored, and dispatched with the utmost care and efficiency. Our warehouse professionals oversee inventory management, quality control, order fulfilment, and distribution logistics from our strategically located facilities in Dakar. With modern warehousing equipment and rigorous safety protocols, this team ensures that your goods are secure, well-organized, and ready for dispatch at a moment's notice.
aboutTeam.supportText: The Customer Support team is the face of WTL, providing responsive, knowledgeable, and friendly service to our clients around the clock. From handling inquiries and providing shipment updates to resolving issues and gathering feedback, our customer support professionals are dedicated to ensuring that every client interaction is positive and productive. They serve as the bridge between our clients and our operations teams, ensuring clear communication and complete transparency throughout the logistics process.
aboutTeam.cultureTitle: What It Means to Be Part of WTL
aboutTeam.cultureText: At WTL, we foster a culture of collaboration, continuous learning, and mutual respect. We believe that when our people grow, the company grows -- and our clients benefit from a team that is motivated, skilled, and passionate about logistics.
aboutTeam.profDevText: We invest in ongoing training and certification programs to ensure our team members stay at the cutting edge of the logistics industry. From international freight forwarding certifications to customs compliance training and leadership development, we provide our people with the tools they need to excel in their roles and advance their careers.
aboutTeam.collabText: Logistics is a team sport, and WTL thrives on collaboration. Our open-door culture encourages cross-departmental communication and problem-solving, ensuring that every challenge is met with the full collective expertise of the organization. When our teams work together, our clients receive faster, smarter, and more comprehensive solutions.
aboutTeam.ctaTitle: Want to work with a team that delivers excellence?
aboutTeam.ctaText: Whether you are looking for a logistics partner or a career opportunity, WTL welcomes you. Get in touch to learn more about how our team can serve your business.

aboutValues.pageSubtitle: The principles that define who we are and how we serve our clients.
aboutValues.introTitle: Core Values That Guide Everything We Do
aboutValues.introText: At World Trans & Logistics, our values are not just words on a page -- they are the principles that shape our decisions, define our culture, and determine how we interact with our clients, partners, and communities. These six core values are embedded in every aspect of our operations, from the boardroom to the warehouse floor.
aboutValues.integrityP1: Integrity is the foundation of every relationship we build. At WTL, we conduct all our business dealings with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards that exceed industry norms. We believe that trust is earned through consistent, principled behaviour -- and we work hard every day to maintain the trust that our clients, partners, and communities place in us.
aboutValues.integrityP2: From transparent pricing and accurate documentation to honest communication about timelines and challenges, integrity runs through every interaction at WTL. We do what we say, and we say what we mean.
aboutValues.excellenceP1: We hold ourselves to the highest standards in everything we do. Excellence at WTL means going beyond meeting expectations -- it means consistently exceeding them. Whether it is the precision of our customs documentation, the speed of our freight operations, or the quality of our customer service, we strive for outstanding performance at every touchpoint.
aboutValues.excellenceP2: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our rigorous quality assurance processes, our investment in continuous improvement, and our 98% client satisfaction rate. We never settle for "good enough" when "exceptional" is within reach.
aboutValues.innovationP1: In a rapidly evolving industry, standing still is not an option. WTL embraces technology and creative thinking to continuously improve our services, streamline our processes, and deliver greater value to our clients. We actively seek out new tools, methodologies, and partnerships that can enhance the logistics experience.
aboutValues.innovationP2: From implementing advanced shipment tracking systems and digital documentation platforms to exploring sustainable transport solutions and data-driven route optimization, innovation is woven into the fabric of our daily operations.
aboutValues.customerFirstP1: Our clients are the reason we exist, and their success is our success. The Customer First value means that every decision we make is evaluated through the lens of its impact on our clients. We listen actively, respond promptly, and go the extra mile to ensure that our services meet and exceed the unique needs of each business we serve.
aboutValues.customerFirstP2: This client-centric approach means dedicated account management, flexible service options, proactive problem-solving, and a genuine commitment to building long-term partnerships rather than transactional relationships.
aboutValues.teamworkP1: Great logistics requires great collaboration. At WTL, we cultivate a culture of teamwork where every department, every role, and every individual contributes to our collective success. We believe that the best solutions emerge when diverse perspectives come together, and we actively foster an environment where open communication, mutual respect, and shared accountability are the norm.
aboutValues.teamworkP2: Our collaborative culture extends beyond our internal teams to include our network of agents, carriers, and partners around the world. Together, we achieve what no single organization could accomplish alone.
aboutValues.sustainabilityP1: We are committed to conducting our business in a way that protects and preserves the environment for future generations. Sustainability at WTL is not an afterthought -- it is a core value that influences our choice of carriers, our route planning, our warehousing operations, and our corporate policies.
aboutValues.sustainabilityP2: We actively pursue initiatives to reduce emissions, minimize waste, and promote environmentally responsible practices throughout our supply chain. By choosing WTL, our clients partner with a company that takes its environmental responsibilities as seriously as its commercial commitments.
aboutValues.practiceTitle: How Our Values Shape Your Experience
aboutValues.practiceP1: When you partner with WTL, you experience our values in action. Integrity means you receive honest quotes with no hidden fees. Excellence means your shipments are handled with meticulous care. Innovation means you benefit from the latest logistics technologies. Customer First means you always have a responsive, knowledgeable team at your service.
aboutValues.practiceP2: Teamwork means your logistics challenges are tackled by a coordinated, cross-functional team. And Sustainability means your supply chain is managed with environmental consciousness. These are not abstract principles -- they are the tangible qualities that our clients experience in every interaction with WTL.
aboutValues.ctaTitle: Partner with a company whose values align with yours
aboutValues.ctaText: At WTL, we believe that shared values are the foundation of strong partnerships. Discover how our commitment to integrity, excellence, and sustainability can benefit your business.

aboutNetworks.pageSubtitle: A global logistics network rooted in West Africa, reaching every corner of the world.
aboutNetworks.networkTitle: Connecting Continents from the Heart of West Africa
aboutNetworks.networkP1: World Trans & Logistics has built one of the most extensive logistics networks in West Africa, spanning over 50 countries across four continents. Our network is the result of years of strategic partnership development, careful agent selection, and continuous investment in trade lane capabilities that connect businesses in Senegal and across the region to global markets.
aboutNetworks.networkP2: From our headquarters in Dakar, we coordinate a seamless web of ocean freight, air cargo, road transport, and rail connections that ensure your goods move efficiently regardless of origin or destination. Our network is designed for flexibility and resilience, with multiple routing options and contingency plans to handle disruptions and keep your supply chain flowing.
aboutNetworks.networkP3: Whether you are importing raw materials from Asia, exporting finished goods to Europe, or managing intra-African trade, WTL's network provides the reach, reliability, and local expertise to make it happen.
aboutNetworks.hqTitle: Dakar, Senegal -- The Gateway to West Africa
aboutNetworks.hqText: Strategically positioned on the Atlantic coast, Dakar serves as the primary hub for WTL's global operations.
aboutNetworks.headOfficeText: Our headquarters is located at RUE Du Liban X Brazza, Dakar, Senegal -- in the heart of the city's commercial district. This central location provides excellent access to the Port of Dakar, Blaise Diagne International Airport, and the major overland corridors that connect Senegal to its neighbouring countries. Our modern office facility houses our executive team, operations centre, customer support hub, and administrative departments.
aboutNetworks.portText: The Port of Dakar is one of the most important deep-water ports in West Africa, handling millions of tonnes of cargo annually. WTL maintains close working relationships with the port authority, terminal operators, and shipping lines operating out of Dakar, giving our clients priority access, faster clearance times, and competitive rates. Our proximity to the port enables us to manage ocean freight operations with exceptional efficiency and responsiveness.
aboutNetworks.airHubText: Blaise Diagne International Airport (DSS) is a major air cargo gateway for the West African region. WTL leverages this hub to provide fast, reliable air freight services for time-sensitive shipments. Our team at the airport handles cargo acceptance, security screening, documentation, and customs clearance, ensuring that your air shipments are processed swiftly and in full compliance with IATA regulations.
aboutNetworks.warehouseText: WTL operates modern warehousing facilities in the Dakar metropolitan area, providing secure storage, inventory management, and distribution services. Our warehouses are equipped with advanced handling equipment, security systems, and climate-controlled areas for sensitive cargo. Located near the port and major transport routes, our facilities are optimized for efficient cargo flow and rapid dispatch.
aboutNetworks.regionalTitle: Our Reach Across Key Global Markets
aboutNetworks.regionalText: WTL's network connects four major regions, each served by a combination of our own offices, exclusive agents, and strategic partnerships with leading local logistics providers.
aboutNetworks.westAfricaText: West Africa is our home, and we know it better than anyone. Our network covers every ECOWAS member state, including Senegal, Mali, Guinea, Ivory Coast, Ghana, Nigeria, Burkina Faso, and beyond. We operate direct road and rail corridors connecting landlocked countries to the coast, manage cross-border customs clearance, and maintain strong relationships with local authorities and transport operators across the region. Our West African coverage is the strongest in the industry.
aboutNetworks.europeText: Europe is one of West Africa's most important trading partners, and WTL maintains robust connections with major European ports and logistics hubs. Our network includes agents and partners in France, Spain, the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, the United Kingdom, Italy, and Turkey. We offer regular ocean freight services between Dakar and key European ports including Le Havre, Rotterdam, Antwerp, Hamburg, and Barcelona, as well as competitive air freight options through major European airports.
aboutNetworks.asiaText: With the rapid growth of trade between Africa and Asia, WTL has invested heavily in building strong connections to major Asian markets. Our network reaches China, India, the UAE, South Korea, Japan, Vietnam, and other key economies. We facilitate both import and export flows, handling everything from containerized cargo and bulk commodities to project freight and specialized equipment. Our Asian network is supported by partnerships with leading carriers and freight forwarders in the region.
aboutNetworks.americasText: WTL connects West African businesses to markets across North and South America through our network of agents and carrier partnerships. We service trade lanes to the United States, Canada, Brazil, Argentina, and other key destinations. Whether you are exporting agricultural products to North America or importing machinery from Brazil, our Americas network ensures smooth, compliant, and cost-effective logistics across the Atlantic.
aboutNetworks.strategicText: Our logistics capabilities are amplified by strategic relationships with major ports and a carefully curated network of agents worldwide.
aboutNetworks.portConnectionsP1: WTL maintains strong operational relationships with some of the world's busiest and most strategic ports. In West Africa, we are connected to the ports of Dakar, Abidjan, Tema, Lagos (Apapa and Tin Can Island), Conakry, and Lome. Internationally, our network includes direct access to the ports of Rotterdam, Antwerp, Hamburg, Le Havre, Shanghai, Singapore, Jebel Ali, and several key ports in the Americas.
aboutNetworks.portConnectionsP2: These port connections are supported by contracts with major shipping lines including MSC, Maersk, CMA CGM, Hapag-Lloyd, and others, ensuring competitive rates, reliable schedules, and priority cargo handling for our clients.
aboutNetworks.agentNetworkP1: At the heart of WTL's global reach is our network of trusted agents -- local logistics professionals who represent our interests and serve our clients in markets around the world. Every agent in our network is carefully vetted for reliability, expertise, financial stability, and alignment with our values and service standards.
aboutNetworks.agentNetworkP2: Our agents provide on-the-ground support including cargo handling, customs clearance, warehousing, local transportation, and real-time communication with our Dakar operations centre. This agent model allows us to offer truly local service in global markets, combining the reach of an international network with the knowledge and responsiveness of a local partner.
aboutNetworks.ctaTitle: Leverage our global network for your logistics needs
aboutNetworks.ctaText: From Dakar to every major trade lane in the world, WTL's network is ready to move your cargo. Contact us today to discover how our connections can work for your business.

servicesFreight.pageSubtitle: Comprehensive freight solutions across air, ocean, and land for West Africa and beyond.
servicesFreight.overviewText: World Trans & Logistics provides comprehensive freight services across all major transport modes. Whether you need to move goods by air, sea, or land, our experienced team ensures your cargo reaches its destination safely, on time, and at competitive rates.
servicesFreight.trustedPartnerTitle: Your Trusted Freight Partner in West Africa
servicesFreight.trustedPartnerText1: With decades of experience in the logistics industry and deep roots in Senegal and West Africa, WTL has built one of the most reliable freight networks in the region. We understand the unique challenges of shipping to, from, and within the continent.
servicesFreight.trustedPartnerText2: From single shipments to complex supply chain solutions, we tailor our freight services to meet the specific needs of each client, providing personalized attention and expert guidance every step of the way.
servicesFreight.freightModesTitle: Choose the Right Mode for Your Cargo
servicesFreight.freightModesText: We offer flexible shipping options to match your timeline, budget, and cargo requirements. Each mode comes with full WTL support from pickup to delivery.
servicesFreight.airFreightText: Fast, reliable air cargo services for time-sensitive shipments. We work with leading airlines to provide express, standard, and charter options worldwide.
servicesFreight.oceanFreightText: Cost-effective sea freight solutions for all cargo sizes. FCL, LCL, and breakbulk services connecting West Africa to global markets.
servicesFreight.landFreightText: Reliable road transport services across West Africa. FTL and LTL solutions with GPS tracking and experienced drivers.
servicesFreight.keyBenefitsTitle: Key Benefits of Our Freight Services
servicesFreight.benefitSpeedText: Optimized transit times with reliable carrier partnerships and proactive schedule management.
servicesFreight.benefitCostText: Competitive rates through volume commitments, carrier negotiations, and route optimization.
servicesFreight.benefitVisibilityText: Real-time tracking and proactive updates at every milestone of your shipment journey.
servicesFreight.benefitGlobalText: Extensive network of offices and agents across West Africa, Europe, Asia, and the Americas.
servicesFreight.ctaTitle: Ready to Ship? Get a Free Freight Quote
servicesFreight.ctaText: Tell us about your shipment and our team will provide a competitive quote within 24 hours.

servicesOcean.pageSubtitle: Reliable sea freight solutions connecting West Africa to the world's major ports.
servicesOcean.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics offers a full suite of ocean freight services to and from the Port of Dakar and other major West African ports. With strong relationships with leading shipping lines including MSC, Maersk, CMA CGM, and Hapag-Lloyd, we secure competitive rates and reliable schedules for your cargo.
servicesOcean.overviewText2: Whether you are shipping a single container or managing a complex supply chain with multiple weekly sailings, our ocean freight team provides expert guidance on routing, vessel selection, documentation, and customs clearance to ensure smooth, timely delivery.
servicesOcean.overviewText3: Our deep knowledge of West African port operations, combined with our global agent network, makes WTL the ideal partner for ocean freight in the region.
servicesOcean.serviceOptionsTitle: Ocean Freight Solutions for Every Need
servicesOcean.serviceOptionsText: From full container loads to specialized cargo, we offer flexible ocean freight options tailored to your requirements.
servicesOcean.fclText: Dedicated containers for larger shipments, offering faster transit times and reduced handling.
servicesOcean.lclText: Cost-effective solution for smaller shipments, sharing container space with other cargo.
servicesOcean.breakbulkText: Specialized handling for cargo that cannot fit in standard containers, including vehicles and heavy equipment.
servicesOcean.reeferText: Temperature-controlled shipping for perishable goods, pharmaceuticals, and sensitive cargo.
servicesOcean.portToPortText: Comprehensive port operations management including documentation, customs, and cargo handling.
servicesOcean.customsText: Expert customs brokerage and trade documentation services for smooth port clearance.
servicesOcean.whyTitle: Why Choose WTL for Ocean Freight?
servicesOcean.whyPortText: Deep operational knowledge of the Port of Dakar and major West African ports.
servicesOcean.whyDocsText: Expert handling of all shipping documentation and regulatory requirements.
servicesOcean.whyInsuranceText: Comprehensive marine cargo insurance options for complete peace of mind.
servicesOcean.whyScheduleText: Access to frequent sailing schedules with all major shipping lines.
servicesOcean.ctaText: Get a competitive ocean freight quote for your next shipment. Our team is ready to help.

servicesLand.pageSubtitle: Reliable road transport solutions across West Africa and the Sahel region.
servicesLand.overviewTitle: West Africa's Trusted Road Freight Partner
servicesLand.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics operates one of the most extensive road freight networks in West Africa, connecting Senegal to its neighbouring countries through a fleet of modern trucks and a network of experienced transport partners.
servicesLand.overviewText2: Our land freight services cover the major trade corridors of the region, including the vital Dakar-Bamako corridor serving landlocked Mali, routes to Guinea, The Gambia, Mauritania, Burkina Faso, and Guinea-Bissau. We handle everything from full truckloads to partial shipments, with full GPS tracking and security for every journey.
servicesLand.overviewText3: With decades of experience navigating West African roads, border crossings, and regulations, WTL ensures your cargo moves safely and efficiently across the region.
servicesLand.ftlText: Dedicated trucks for your cargo, offering direct point-to-point transport with maximum speed and security.
servicesLand.ltlText: Cost-effective option for smaller shipments, consolidated with other cargo on shared vehicles.
servicesLand.crossBorderText: Specialized cross-border freight services within the ECOWAS region, managing customs and documentation at every border.
servicesLand.gpsText: Real-time vehicle tracking for complete visibility of your cargo in transit.
servicesLand.driversText: Experienced, vetted drivers with deep knowledge of West African routes and borders.
servicesLand.maintenanceText: Regularly serviced, modern fleet ensuring reliability and safety on every trip.
servicesLand.safetyText: Sealed loads, escort services, and 24/7 monitoring for high-value shipments.
servicesLand.ctaTitle: Need Road Freight in West Africa?
servicesLand.ctaText: Get a competitive quote for road transport across the region. Fast, reliable, and fully tracked.

servicesWarehousing.pageSubtitle: Modern warehousing facilities in Dakar for secure storage, handling, and distribution.
servicesWarehousing.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics operates modern warehousing facilities in the Dakar metropolitan area, strategically located near the Port of Dakar and major transport corridors. Our warehouses provide secure, efficient storage and handling for all types of cargo.
servicesWarehousing.overviewText2: From short-term storage during customs clearance to long-term inventory management and distribution, our warehousing team delivers flexible solutions tailored to your business needs. Our facilities are equipped with the latest handling equipment, security systems, and inventory management technology.
servicesWarehousing.overviewText3: Whether you need bonded storage, climate-controlled space, or high-volume distribution capabilities, WTL has the infrastructure and expertise to support your supply chain.
servicesWarehousing.climateText: Temperature and humidity-controlled areas for sensitive cargo including pharmaceuticals, food products, and electronics.
servicesWarehousing.bondedText: Customs-bonded facilities for goods awaiting clearance or re-export, deferring duty payments until release.
servicesWarehousing.inventoryText: Real-time inventory tracking and management using modern WMS technology for complete stock visibility.
servicesWarehousing.pickPackText: Order fulfilment services including picking, packing, labelling, and dispatch for B2B and B2C shipments.
servicesWarehousing.crossDockText: Rapid transfer of goods from inbound to outbound transport with minimal storage time.
servicesWarehousing.valueAddedText: Additional services to enhance your warehouse operations and prepare goods for market.
servicesWarehousing.whyLocationText: Strategically located near the Port of Dakar and major transport corridors.
servicesWarehousing.whySecurityText: Round-the-clock security with CCTV, access control, and fire protection systems.
servicesWarehousing.whyScalableText: Flexible warehouse space that grows with your business needs.
servicesWarehousing.whyIntegratedText: Seamlessly connected to our freight, customs, and distribution services.
servicesWarehousing.ctaText: Contact us for a tailored warehousing solution that fits your storage and distribution needs.

servicesNvocc.pageSubtitle: Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier services for flexible, cost-effective ocean shipping.
servicesNvocc.overviewTitle: Flexible Ocean Shipping Without Vessel Ownership
servicesNvocc.overviewText1: As a licensed NVOCC (Non-Vessel Operating Common Carrier), World Trans & Logistics offers the flexibility and cost advantages of a shipping line without owning vessels. We purchase container space in bulk from major ocean carriers and resell it to our clients at competitive rates.
servicesNvocc.overviewText2: This model allows us to offer flexible booking options, consolidated container services, and our own House Bills of Lading, giving you more control and better pricing than dealing directly with shipping lines for smaller volumes.
servicesNvocc.overviewText3: Our NVOCC operations are backed by full FMC and local licensing, comprehensive cargo liability coverage, and a dedicated team of ocean freight specialists based in Dakar.
servicesNvocc.bolText: We issue our own House Bills of Lading, providing our clients with flexible document control and trade facilitation.
servicesNvocc.consolidationText: We consolidate multiple LCL shipments into full containers, reducing costs for clients with smaller cargo volumes.
servicesNvocc.deconsolidationText: At destination, we manage the deconsolidation process, sorting and delivering individual shipments to their final consignees.
servicesNvocc.whyTitle: Why Use WTL as Your NVOCC?
servicesNvocc.whyRatesText: Bulk purchasing power with major carriers means lower per-unit shipping costs for you.
servicesNvocc.whyFlexText: More flexible booking deadlines and cargo acceptance compared to direct carrier bookings.
servicesNvocc.whyContactText: One WTL team handles everything from booking to delivery, simplifying your logistics.
servicesNvocc.whyLiabilityText: Full NVOCC cargo liability coverage under our operating license for your peace of mind.
servicesNvocc.ctaText: Discover the advantages of WTL's NVOCC services. Get better rates and more control over your ocean freight.

servicesProjectCargo.pageSubtitle: Specialized logistics for oversized, heavy-lift, and complex project shipments.
servicesProjectCargo.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics specializes in the transport of oversized, heavy-lift, and complex project cargo that requires expert planning and specialized equipment. From industrial machinery and power generation equipment to mining infrastructure and construction materials, we deliver where standard freight services cannot.
servicesProjectCargo.overviewText2: Our project cargo team brings decades of combined experience in engineering-driven logistics, working closely with clients, equipment manufacturers, and local authorities to plan and execute every move with precision.
servicesProjectCargo.overviewText3: With deep expertise in West African infrastructure and access to specialized transport equipment, WTL is the partner of choice for major project developments across the region.
servicesProjectCargo.heavyLiftText: Specialized transport for extra-heavy cargo requiring cranes, multi-axle trailers, and engineered lifting plans.
servicesProjectCargo.oversizedText: Transport solutions for cargo exceeding standard dimensions, including route surveys and permit management.
servicesProjectCargo.routeSurveyText: Comprehensive route analysis to identify optimal paths, potential obstacles, and required permits.
servicesProjectCargo.industrialText: End-to-end logistics for factory equipment, turbines, generators, transformers, and industrial plant components.
servicesProjectCargo.charteringText: Charter services for cargo that requires dedicated vessel or aircraft capacity, including breakbulk and heavy-lift vessels.
servicesProjectCargo.projectMgmtText: Dedicated project managers oversee every aspect of your shipment from planning through to final delivery and installation.
servicesProjectCargo.whyTitle: Why Choose WTL for Project Cargo?
servicesProjectCargo.whyTechText: Engineering-driven approach to planning and executing complex cargo movements.
servicesProjectCargo.whySpecialistText: Access to specialized equipment and partners across West Africa and globally.
servicesProjectCargo.whyTrackText: Successful delivery of major project cargo for mining, energy, and infrastructure sectors.
servicesProjectCargo.whySafetyText: Rigorous safety protocols and risk management for every project cargo movement.
servicesProjectCargo.ctaText: Our project cargo specialists are ready to engineer the perfect solution for your oversized or heavy-lift shipment.

servicesDoorToDoor.pageSubtitle: Complete logistics management from origin to destination, anywhere in the world.
servicesDoorToDoor.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics provides comprehensive door-to-door delivery services that manage every step of the shipping process, from collection at the origin to final delivery at the destination. You give us the cargo; we handle everything else.
servicesDoorToDoor.overviewText2: Our door-to-door service integrates all transport modes, customs clearance, documentation, insurance, and last-mile delivery into a single, seamless package. One point of contact, one invoice, and complete peace of mind.
servicesDoorToDoor.overviewText3: Whether you are shipping from China to Dakar, from Europe to Bamako, or from Senegal to anywhere in the world, WTL's door-to-door service removes the complexity from international logistics.
servicesDoorToDoor.processText: A simple, transparent process that takes the hassle out of international shipping.
servicesDoorToDoor.step1Text: We collect your cargo from the supplier's premises or any specified origin point, handling all packing and loading.
servicesDoorToDoor.step2Text: Your cargo moves via the optimal combination of air, sea, and road transport, fully tracked throughout.
servicesDoorToDoor.step3Text: Our licensed brokers handle all customs formalities, documentation, and regulatory compliance at both ends.
servicesDoorToDoor.step4Text: Last-mile delivery to your warehouse, office, or project site with proof of delivery confirmation.
servicesDoorToDoor.whyContactText: One dedicated point of contact manages your entire shipment from start to finish.
servicesDoorToDoor.whyPricingText: One transparent quote covering all transport, customs, and handling charges.
servicesDoorToDoor.whyVisibilityText: Track your shipment at every stage from collection to final delivery.
servicesDoorToDoor.whyTimeText: No need to coordinate multiple service providers. We manage everything for you.
servicesDoorToDoor.ctaText: Let WTL handle your logistics from door to door. Get a complete quote for your next shipment.

servicesInland.pageSubtitle: Efficient domestic transport and distribution across Senegal and the region.
servicesInland.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics provides comprehensive inland transportation services across Senegal, connecting major cities, industrial zones, ports, and airports with reliable, GPS-tracked transport solutions.
servicesInland.overviewText2: Our inland services bridge the gap between international freight and final delivery, ensuring that cargo arriving at the Port of Dakar or Blaise Diagne International Airport reaches its final destination quickly and safely.
servicesInland.overviewText3: From first-mile pickup to last-mile delivery, our fleet and transport partners cover the full spectrum of domestic logistics needs.
servicesInland.domesticText: Reliable trucking services across Senegal with a range of vehicle types for all cargo needs.
servicesInland.firstLastText: Specialized pickup and delivery services connecting ports, airports, and warehouses to final destinations.
servicesInland.intermodalText: Combined road and rail solutions for cost-effective long-distance domestic transport.
servicesInland.fleetText: Well-maintained, diverse vehicle fleet suitable for any cargo type and volume.
servicesInland.trackingText: GPS-enabled fleet tracking with live updates and ETA notifications.
servicesInland.schedulesText: Scheduled services and on-demand transport to meet your timeline.
servicesInland.routeOptText: Intelligent route planning for faster delivery and lower transport costs.
servicesInland.coverageText: Our inland transport network reaches every major city and economic zone in Senegal.
servicesInland.ctaText: From port drayage to nationwide distribution, WTL has you covered. Get a quote today.

servicesForwarding.pageSubtitle: Expert freight forwarding and customs brokerage for seamless international trade.
servicesForwarding.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics is a licensed freight forwarder and customs broker, providing comprehensive trade facilitation services for importers and exporters in Senegal and across West Africa.
servicesForwarding.overviewText2: Our forwarding team manages the complex web of documentation, regulations, and logistics involved in international trade, ensuring your goods move across borders smoothly and in full compliance with all requirements.
servicesForwarding.overviewText3: From customs declarations and trade documentation to cargo insurance and regulatory advisory, WTL's forwarding services remove the complexity from international commerce.
servicesForwarding.docsText: Expert preparation and management of all trade documents required for international shipments.
servicesForwarding.docsFeature1: Bills of lading and airway bills
servicesForwarding.customsText: Licensed customs brokers managing all import and export clearance through the GAINDE system.
servicesForwarding.insuranceText: Comprehensive cargo insurance arranged through reputable insurers for all transport modes.
servicesForwarding.consolidationText: Groupage services that combine multiple shipments for cost-effective international transport.
servicesForwarding.complianceText: Ensuring your shipments meet all regulatory requirements for hassle-free border crossings.
servicesForwarding.advisoryText: Expert guidance on trade regulations, Incoterms, duty optimization, and market entry logistics.
servicesForwarding.whyTitle: Why Choose WTL for Freight Forwarding?
servicesForwarding.whyLicensedText: Licensed freight forwarder and customs broker with full regulatory approval.
servicesForwarding.whyNetworkText: Agent network spanning 50+ countries for seamless international coordination.
servicesForwarding.whyDigitalText: Online tracking, documentation, and reporting through our client portal.
servicesForwarding.whyPersonalText: Dedicated account managers providing personalized attention to every client.
servicesForwarding.ctaText: Let WTL's experienced team handle your international trade logistics. Contact us for a consultation.

servicesDistribution.pageSubtitle: End-to-end distribution and fulfilment services across West Africa.
servicesDistribution.overviewText1: World Trans & Logistics provides comprehensive distribution services that connect your supply chain from warehouse to customer. Our distribution network covers Senegal and the wider West African region, ensuring your products reach their markets efficiently.
servicesDistribution.overviewText2: From order fulfilment and retail distribution to e-commerce logistics and reverse logistics, our team manages the entire distribution process with precision and care.
servicesDistribution.overviewText3: Our distribution services are fully integrated with our warehousing, transport, and forwarding capabilities, providing a seamless end-to-end supply chain solution.
servicesDistribution.fulfilmentText: Complete order processing from receipt to dispatch, supporting B2B and B2C channels.
servicesDistribution.retailText: Scheduled and on-demand distribution to retail stores, supermarkets, and outlets across the region.
servicesDistribution.ecommerceText: Fulfilment solutions tailored for online retailers, with fast processing and last-mile delivery.
servicesDistribution.reverseText: Efficient management of product returns, exchanges, and warranty claims.
servicesDistribution.inventoryText: Strategic stock positioning and replenishment across multiple locations for optimal availability.
servicesDistribution.valueAddedText: Additional services that add value to your distribution chain and enhance customer experience.
servicesDistribution.whyAccuracyText: Industry-leading pick and pack accuracy rates for reliable order fulfilment.
servicesDistribution.whyScalableText: Flexible capacity that scales with your seasonal demand and business growth.
servicesDistribution.whyTechText: Modern WMS and TMS systems for efficient, data-driven distribution operations.
servicesDistribution.whyReachText: Distribution network covering Senegal and the wider West African market.
servicesDistribution.ctaText: Let WTL manage your distribution and fulfilment. Contact us for a tailored solution.
